karyotype: Seti yathunthu ya ma chromosome m'thupi
homologous: Ma chromosome omwe ali ofanana m'mawonekedwe ndipo amanyamula majini amtundu womwewo
meiosis: Njira yogawanitsa ma cell yomwe imapanga gametes (umuna ndi dzira) ndi theka la chiwerengero cha ma chromosome monga selo la kholo.
mitosis: Njira yogawanitsa ma cell yomwe imapanga maselo atsopano okhala ndi ma chromosome ofanana ndi selo la kholo
karyotyping: Kusanthula ma chromosome amunthu kuti azindikire zolakwika
phenotype: Makhalidwe owoneka a chamoyo, amatsimikiziridwa ndi genotype ndi chilengedwe
wolamulira: Chilichonse chomwe chimabisa zotsatira za allele yokhazikika ikakhala pa chromosome yomweyo
wokhazikika: Chilichonse chomwe chimabisika ndi allele yayikulu chikakhala pa chromosome yomweyo
malo a punnett: Chithunzi chomwe chimagwiritsidwa ntchito poneneratu za kuthekera kwa ana kutengera makhalidwe enaake
sayansi yamakono: Kugwiritsa ntchito zamoyo kapena zinthu zawo kusintha kapena kupanga zatsopano kapena njira
gmo: Mawu ofupikitsa operekedwa kwa zamoyo zomwe mapangidwe ake obadwa nawo asinthidwa m'njira yosachitika mwachilengedwe.
antibiotic: Zinthu zomwe zimapha kapena kulepheretsa kukula kwa mabakiteriya
kachilombo: Matenda opatsirana omwe amangobwereza m'maselo a zamoyo zomwe zimagwidwa
katemera: Kukonzekera kwachilengedwe komwe kumapereka chitetezo ku matenda enaake
mantha dongosolo: Maukonde a ma cell apadera omwe amatumiza uthenga mthupi lonse
dongosolo la endocrine: Dongosolo la tiziwalo timene timatulutsa timadzi tomwe timayendetsa ntchito zosiyanasiyana za thupi
circulatory dongosolo: Dongosolo la ziwalo ndi zotengera zomwe zimanyamula magazi mthupi lonse
chitetezo cha mthupi: Dongosolo la maselo ndi ziwalo zomwe zimateteza thupi ku matenda
tizilombo toyambitsa matenda: Microorganism kapena kachilombo komwe kamayambitsa matenda
kusintha kwachisinthiko: Khalidwe lomwe limapereka mwayi wokhala ndi moyo kapena ubereki ku chamoyo chomwe chili pamalo ake
speciation: Njira yomwe mitundu yatsopano imayambira kuchokera ku mitundu yomwe ilipo
